mapper.select: Select distinct p.pkage_id, city_id, pkage_name, pkage_info, pkage_soldCnt, pkage_score, pkage_Img_path pkage_dt_Aprice FROM (package p left join package_image pi on p.pkage_id = pi.pkage_id) left join package_detail pd on p.pkage_id = pd.pkage_id Where pkage_name LIKe concat('%', #{search_word}, '%')
